cab.content: -----...........A r\ ,1 \V , A. 1y-rj (This Document is the Property ofit;-.:*V" '' His Britannic Majesty's Government.)s FcTr e t.Operations *From:- General Van Deventer,East Africa.To:- C.I,G,S.,War Office.2.9.17.Handed in 12 midnight.Go .071.Lupembe column inflicted severe local defeat Aumann on August 30th. 3 Whites and 92 Asknris killed or captured besides wounded who escaped. Our casualties 23. Column still in pursuit. Advanced troops of the Belgian Southern Brigade have crossed the Kilombero River near Punga, G.e.e.K.7.a.Shorthoses columnffirmly established Tunduru. has had several successful patrol actions.
